description: This file defines an interface IController within the WPEFramework plugin host namespace. The interface declares several pure virtual methods for operations such as Persist, Delete, Reboot, retrieving Environment and Configuration, and Clone, that are likely used for controlling or managing device or application states.

classes.name: IController
classes.description: A deprecated external interface class for controlling aspects of the device or application, including persistence, deletion, reboot, environment retrieval, configuration, and cloning.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes data or resources at the specified path.

methods.name: Environment
methods.description: Retrieves environment information identified by index.

methods.name: Configuration (getter)
methods.description: Retrieves configuration associated with the specified callsign.

methods.name: Configuration (setter)
methods.description: Sets configuration for the specified callsign.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Creates a clone based on a base callsign with a new callsign.

ctags.name: IController
ctags.pattern: /^struct DEPRECATED EXTERNAL IController : public virtual Core::IUnknown {$/
